channel.title: Toplist Issue
channel.description:
I have had this issue with the toplist for a longtime and this still hasn't been solved even though I posted on the thread and eventually pm'd staff. My IP has changed due to losing my Dedicated Server and I wanted to change it to no-ip (it was the dedi ip for a while because of no-ip being shut down). No one responded to my request to change the ip on the toplist for nearly a month and now it shows I have a lot of down time and it has said offline for ages.
I would like this: https://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=23.235.230.154
changed to: elveron.no-ip.org
Thanks a ton!

item.title: Toplist Issue
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

PM Moparisthebest, if you ask nice enough he might consider doing it. The topic you posted the request on was designed for when no-ip had some issues and people needed their address changing to avoid downtime that was beyond their control. We have no policy for changing your SSP information and a lot of the time it won’t happen. All I can say is next time use no-ip initially instead of the server IP.

EDIT - I’ve been told your IP was changed to the server IP when no-ip went down, while this may seem unreasonable I’m going to have to stand by the above. You can ask MITB but you should’ve had your no-ip changed to another dynamic host.

Read full topic
